title: Environmental Violation Type Vocabulary
description: Controlled vocabulary for categories of environmental non-compliance and violations.

terms.label: Permit Exceedance
terms.definition: A violation in which monitored or reported values exceed limits established in an environmental permit or authorization.

terms.label: Unpermitted Discharge or Activity
terms.definition: A discharge or activity occurring without the required permit or authorization under applicable regulations.

terms.label: Reporting or Recordkeeping Violation
terms.definition: Failure to submit required reports, maintain records, or provide accurate information as required by environmental regulation or permit terms.

terms.label: Monitoring Non-compliance
terms.definition: Failure to conduct required monitoring, sampling, or analysis according to specified methods or schedules.

terms.label: Operational Non-compliance
terms.definition: Non-compliance with required operating conditions, control measures, or best practices specified in permits or regulations.

terms.label: Other Environmental Violation
terms.definition: A type of environmental non-compliance that does not fit another, more specific category in this vocabulary.
